ground_truth_answer: Under TILA-RESPA rules, lenders must provide the Loan Estimate within 3 business days of receiving the loan application (the 3/7/3 rule). For the right of rescission, borrowers have 3 business days to cancel after signing the mortgage contract, receiving the TILA disclosure, and receiving two copies of the rescission notice. However, if the TILA disclosure or rescission notice is not received or is inaccurate, the rescission period can extend up to 3 years.
